channel.title: CVE Feed for shiro8 Co., Ltd. -- List (order management) item change plug-in (for EC-CUBE 3.0 series)

item.title: CVE-2021-20825|2024-08-03T17:53:22.783Z -- shiro8%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- list%20%28order%20management%29%20item%20change%20plug-in%20%28for%20ec-cube%203.0%20series%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in List (order management) item change plug-in (for EC-CUBE 3.0 series) Ver.1.1 and earlier allows a remote attacker to inject an arbitrary script via unspecified vectors.
